comments.author: Oleg Kalnichevski
comments.body:
Remaining TestWebApp based test cases ported the the SimpleHttpServer based
testing framework. TestWebApp servlets delted from SVN trunk.

Oleg

description:
Basically TestWebapp based testcases test functionality of Tomcat, rather than
that of HttpClient. They tend to get broken with every major release of Tomcat
and have proven more of a burden than any good
summary: Deprecate and replace TestWebapp with the SimpleHttpServer based testing framework
